titleStmt.title: Humble advice to the conforming and non-conforming ministers and people how to behave themselves under the present liberty / by the author of Toleration not to be abused.
titleStmt.author: Fullwood, Francis, d. 1693.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
"A dialogue betwixt the independent and Presbyterian" has separate t.p.
